summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 KIA SOUL. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 14V822000 (STRUCTURE) AND WAS UNABLE TO SCHEDULE THE RECALL REPAIR WITHIN A REASONABLE TIME FRAME. THE MANUFACTURER WAS UNABLE TO SUPPLY THE CONTACT WITH A LOCAL AUTHORIZED DEALER TO PERFORM THE REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER EXPECTED THE CONTACT TO SHIP THE VEHICLE TO THE STATE OF FLORIDA AND THEN SHIP THE VEHICLE BACK TO THE CONTACT'S STATE AFTER THE RECALL REPAIR, WHICH WAS UNREASONABLE. THE CONTACT WAS UNABLE TO DETERMINE WHEN THE VEHICLE WOULD BE REPAIRED AND HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
